name: Connect the numbers tiles
description:
This game will help you train your mind in an entertaining way. In order to solve these puzzles you must create a path starting with the tile number 1 and reaching the last block with the highest number: 4 for the easy level, 8 for medium and 10 for advanced. The level will not be completed until a line has been drawn that goes through all the numbers following the order and also all tiles have been included in its path.

You will have to finish the puzzle before the time runs out or you will have to start all over again, don't forget it! It's an easy-to-play game that's also entertaining for all ages.

Features:
• Entertaining and easy to learn
• Puzzle with numeric tiles.
• Colorful and funny game.
• More than 550 levels.
• 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium y Advanced.
